column3: Traffic;Kampong Speu: In the early hours of Wednesday September 2
column5: there was a traffic accident between a tourist car on National Road 4
column10: Kampong Speu province.------A white ALPHARD car without license plate
column11: transporting at least 6 Chinese people (3 women) driving from west to east hit the back of a white van driven by Toch Bunthoeun
column12: a male aged 36 from Pursat Province.------In the incident
column14: including the Chinese nationals. The injured were sent to the emergency room at Kampong Speu Provincial Hospital
column15: and others later referred to a hospital in Phnom Penh. ------AREY
